thread.title: Jasmine Lennard 'axed' from Celebrity Big Brother 2017 after racist comments on social media are exposed
thread.title_full: Jasmine Lennard 'axed' from Celebrity Big Brother 2017 after racist comments on social media are exposed

author: Nicola Agius
title: Jasmine Lennard 'axed' from Celebrity Big Brother 2017 after racist comments on social media are exposed
text:
Jasmine Lennard 'axed' from Celebrity Big Brother 2017 after racist comments on social media are exposed Channel 5 bosses are said to be investigating the offensive remarks Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Jasmine Lennard has reportedly been axed from Celebrity Big Brother 2017. 
The new series of the Channel 5 reality show hasn't even started yet, but the model has allegedly been dropped from the line-up after racist comments she previously made on social media were exposed. 
One of the offending tweets believed to be under investigation reads: "All Muslims may not be terrorists but all terrorists are Muslim." 
Another, made back in 2015, is thought to be attacking Caitlyn Jenner while she was undergoing gender reassignment. Jasmine Lennard has reportedly been axed from Celebrity Big Brother 2017 (Photo: Getty) 
It read: "Call me old fashioned, call me ignorant whatever you like you know i’m an honest person and i really can’t pretend that i think that’s ok on any level." 
Channel 5 bosses reportedly offered Jasmin a sum close to six figures to re-enter the house next week. 
Now, insiders close to the star are suspicious as to why they have suddenly pulled out of the deal and have questioned their motives. The new series of the Channel 5 reality show hasn't even started yet, but the model has allegedly been dropped from the line-up after racist comments she previously made on social media were exposed 
A source told The Sun: "It seems crazy that they would have invested that much effort if they were not aware she had sparked Twitter controversies over the last few years. Read More Inside the brand new Celebrity Big Brother house as stars prepare to return to reality show 
"They’ve been asked countless times to clarify what exactly the remarks are but have refused. Channel 5 bosses reportedly offered Jasmin a sum close to six figures to re-enter the house (Photo: PA) 
"The show is locked in a legal battle with Jasmine who feels they are using the remarks as a scapegoat for another reason and that they should honour their agreement and pay the money." 
Mirror Online has contacted Jasmine and Celebrity Big Brother for comment. 
*Celebrity Big Brother returns to Channel 5 on Tuesday at 9pm Like us on Facebook
